title: KinnPorsche Story รักโคตรร้าย สุดท้ายโคตรรัก เล่ม 2
description: ON THE RUNAfter an intimate night with Kinn, Porsche finds himself torn. He never anticipated that becoming the mafia heir's bodyguard would lead to being dosed with an aphrodisiac and relying on his employer for help. Even more confusing is that part of him enjoyed it. Hurt and bewildered, Porsche wants nothing more than to avoid Kinn, but Kinn seems oblivious to his feelings.To make matters worse, Porsche is now being pursued by hired thugs with orders to capture him alive. What could they possibly want with a bodyguard like him? As their mysterious assailants close in, Porsche must put aside his inner conflict if he and Kinn are to escape.
author: Daemi
